Body:
manager = Manager()
manager.on_data = MagicMock()
snapper = Snapper(manager)
sensor1 = Sensor()
snapper.add_sensor(sensor1)
sensor1.publish(2, 1)
snapper.set_window_size(15.0)
sensor2 = Sensor()
snapper.add_sensor(sensor2)
sensor2.publish(3, 1)
sensor2.publish(3, 11)
manager.on_data.assert_called_with({'start': 1, 'end': 10, sensor1.uuid: 2,
    sensor2.uuid: 3})
sensor1.publish(3, 15)
sensor2.publish(5, 16)
sensor1.publish(3, 26)
manager.on_data.assert_called_with({'start': 10, 'end': 24, sensor1.uuid: 3,
    sensor2.uuid: 4})
